DOC.brief_summary: Introduction World Health Organization estimate nearly 10 % births preterm worldwide . In city Pelotas , base previous population study , preterm birth rate increase ( 6.3 % 14.7 % 1982 2004 ) . Preterm birth ( PB ) major public health issue associate case neonatal death consequence link later health outcome . One strong predictor PB gestational hypertension ( eclampsia ) . PB risk gestational hypertension may alter maternal behavior , leisure-time physical activity ( LTPA ) , overall maternal health influence likelihood outcomes occur . Biological plausibility lie fact hypertension condition potentially influence LTPA directly indirectly ( relation excessive gestational weight gain physical activity ) . Also , evidence mental health play role determination PB , although bias cross-sectional nature study , literature show physical activity may influence positively psychological aspect pregnancy . In Brazil le 20 % pregnant woman physically active leisure . Physical activity pregnancy associate several characteristic result improved health profile could potentially decrease hypertension occurrence consequently preterm birth rate . However , clinical trial carry study relationship representative population sample many available evidence base solely observational study . Although early study effect leisure-time physical activity pregnancy concern potential harmful effect health mother fetus , proven time . Currently , grow evidence support safe promotion physical activity pregnancy target benefit maternal child health . However , scientific evidence derive observational study . There urgent need result well-designed experimental study enable good understanding impact exercise pregnancy various health outcome maternal child . Methodology The intervention start 12th 20th week gestation last end pregnancy woman feel uncomfortable exercise routine . The intervention consist three weekly exercise session . Each session last around 60 minute include aerobic exercise ( treadmill stationary cycling ) strength training ( focus major muscle group pregnancy-specific exercise help alleviate low back pain work abdominal pelvic floor muscle prevent urinary incontinence ) . Workouts guide supervised physical education professional previously train . The intensity exercise set accord woman 's fitness level alter accord progress pregnancy base perceived effort . All exercise session take place School Physical Education Federal University Pelotas .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise During Pregnancy Maternal Child Health : Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman least 20th week gestation , live city Pelotas ( Brazil ) , whose delivery due 2015 belonging 2015 Birth Cohort . Hypertension Diabetes Preterm birth history Miscarriage history Heart disease In vitro fertilization Twin pregnancy Persistent bleed Body mass index 35kg/m2 Heavy smoker ( 20 cigarettes/day ) Active woman ( > 150 min/week physical activity ) .
